CommonItemTooltip.Counterweight: Throws a counterweight after hitting an enemy with a yoyo
CommonItemTooltip.BannerBonus: Pemain di sekitar mendapatkan bonus melawan:
CommonItemTooltip.BannerBonusReduced: Pemain di sekitar mendapatkan bonus kecil melawan:
CommonItemTooltip.PressDownToHover:
Press Down to toggle hover
Press Up to deactivate hover
CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats: Peningkatan kecil untuk sebagian besar stat
CommonItemTooltip.MediumStats: Peningkatan sedang untuk sebagian besar stat
CommonItemTooltip.MajorStats: Peningkatan besar untuk sebagian besar stat
CommonItemTooltip.TipsyStats: Peningkatan kecil untuk stat melee & pengurangan defense
CommonItemTooltip.EtherianManaCost10: Menggunakan 10 Etherian Mana per penggunaan saat menjaga Eternia Crystal
CommonItemTooltip.GolfIron:
A well-rounded club best for mid-range distances
Golf balls will carry a good distance with decent vertical loft
CommonItemTooltip.GolfPutter:
A specialized club for finishing holes
Golf balls will stay close to the ground over short distances for precision shots
CommonItemTooltip.GolfWedge:
A specialized club for sand pits or tall obstacles
Golf balls will gain tons of vertical loft but will not carry very far
CommonItemTooltip.GolfDriver:
A powerful club for long distances
Golf balls will carry very far, with little vertical loft
CommonItemTooltip.Kite:
Kites can be flown on windy days
Reel it in with <right>
CommonItemTooltip.TeleportationPylon:
Teleport to another pylon when 2 villagers are nearby
You can only place one per type and in the matching biome
CommonItemTooltip.Whips: Summon-mu akan fokus kepada musuh yang tercambuk
CommonItemTooltip.MechdusaSummonNotDuringEverything: 'It has no effect in this world'
